vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man of the Edomites living at the time of the Patriarchs, first mentioned at Gen.36.11;
son of: Eliphaz (H0464);
brother of: Teman (H8487), Omar (H0201), Zepho (H6825), Kenaz (H7073), Amalek (H6002H) and Korah (H7141H)
§ Gatam = "a burnt valley"
fourth son of Eliphaz and grandson of Esau and one of the dukes of Eliphaz
vocabInfos._es_Definition: hijo de Elifaz; descendant de Esaú
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
迦坦 这个陽性專有名詞在原文的意思是 "燃燒的山谷"
以利法的第四個兒子也是以掃的孫子,
以利法的族長之一 (創 36:15)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
迦坦 这个阳性专有名词在原文的意思是 "燃烧的山谷"
以利法的第四个儿子也是以扫的孙子,
以利法的族长之一 (创 36:15)
